instructions: On the Home screen, tap the camera icon to open the Camera app. Switch to Selfie Panorama mode. See Choosing a capture mode for details. Tap Camera settings slideout menu button to open the slideout menu. Make sure that Selfie Panorama wide mode icon is selected. Hold the phone at face level and in portrait orientation. When you're ready to take the center shot, tap Camera shutter button . While holding your phone steadily, slowly swivel left or right on the phone's axis until you see the white capture box move to the side panel of the panorama overlay. Screen showing a selfie panorama panning to the right. The capture box turns green and you'll hear a shutter sound as the photo is taken. Then, slowly swivel to the opposite side until you see the white capture box move to the other side of the panorama overlay. Screen showing a selfie panorama panning to the left. The capture box turns green and you'll hear a shutter sound as the photo is taken.
